sentences.en: A plumber's coming in to look at the boiler.
sentences.cn: 有位水暖工要来看看热水器.

sentences.en: First cut off the water flow from the boiler.
sentences.cn: 首先切断来自锅炉的水流.

sentences.en: First, disconnect the boiler from the water mains.
sentences.cn: 先将锅炉与供水总管断开。

sentences.en: He replaced the boiler when the last one began to spout flames.
sentences.cn: 原来的锅炉开始往外喷火苗后他便换了个新的。

sentences.en: I happened to meet him in the boiler room.
sentences.cn: 我碰巧在锅炉房遇见他。

sentences.en: In order to save space, the back of the boiler had been let into the wall.
sentences.cn: 为了节省空间, 锅炉的背部被嵌进墙内.

sentences.en: Residents heard an enormous bang as a safety valve on the boiler failed.
sentences.cn: 由于锅炉的安全阀失效，居民们听到了砰的一声巨响。

sentences.en: She kept looking at the dial on the boiler. The needle had reached 250 degrees.
sentences.cn: 她一直看着锅炉上的刻度盘，指针已指向了250度。

sentences.en: She raked out the ashes from the boiler.
sentences.cn: 她把炉灰从锅炉里面耙了出来。

sentences.en: The engine is letting off steam to relieve the pressure in the boiler.
sentences.cn: 机车在放蒸汽,以减少锅炉的气压.

sentences.en: The pressure in the cylinders would go up in proportion to the boiler pressure.
sentences.cn: 汽缸内的压力会随着汽锅压力的增加而相应增加。

sentences.en: The water is forced into the boiler by the feed pump.
This new boiler generates more heat than the old one.
sentences.cn: 这个新锅炉产生的热量比旧锅炉多.

sentences.en: This water is forced into the boiler by the feed pump.

words.tran_cn: 煮沸，烧开；使…激动；使…蒸发
[动力]锅炉；烧水壶，热水器；盛热水器

phrases.tran_cn: 锅炉汽包，锅筒；鼓筒式锅炉
锅炉；锅炉炉膛；锅炉火箱；锅炉燃烧室
（建筑物中的）锅炉房；（不法证券经纪人的）电话交易所
循环流化床锅炉；循环怜床锅炉
电站锅炉，动力锅炉；公用锅炉
热水锅炉；热水器；烧水器

trans.tran_en: a container for boiling water that is part of a steam engine, or is used to provide heating in a house
